info.description: Get data from the annunciator system.
info.title: Annunciator content API

get.summary: Return the current message by annunciator type

parameters.description: First message after date time specified
parameters.name: date

200.description: Latest message for given annunciator was issued before specified date

400.description: Date provided wasn't in a valid format

404.description: No message for given annunciator was issued before specified date

get.summary: Return the most recent message by annunciator after date time specified
